pullRequest.title: Move CorsHandler to server
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently we duplicate our specialized cors logic in all transport
plugins. This is unnecessary as it could be implemented in a single
place. This commit moves the logic to server. Additionally it fixes a
but where we are incorrectly closing http channels on early Cors
responses.

nodes.bodyText: NIT: Maybe move this to CorsHandler as well since we duplicate it across both implementations? (unless my suggestion works and we can just move the whole handling to org.elasticsearch.http.AbstractHttpServerTransport#incomingRequest)
Maybe we could just move this whole logic into org.elasticsearch.http.AbstractHttpServerTransport#incomingRequest to make things even drier?
I guess we can revert changes to this method now?
